doc.title: A Personal History of the Australian Surf
doc.plot: An autobiographical documentary written and directed by Michael Blakemore in 1981 in which he plays his own father. The film was made on 16mm and first screened in the UK at London's National Film Theatre. It was subsequently shown by Channel 4 television. The sub-title of the piece is ...Being the Confessions of a Straight Poofter.
